DataElement.preferredName: Prior Head and Neck Radiation Therapy Occurrence End Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the stop date of an instance of a prior radiation therapy to the area of the body generally construed to comprise base of skull and facial bones, sinuses, orbits, salivary glands, oral cavity, oropharynx, larynx, thyroid, facial and neck musculature and lymph nodes draining these areas.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Head and Neck Radiation Therapy Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to an instance of a prior radiation therapy to the area of the body generally construed to comprise base of skull and facial bones, sinuses, orbits, salivary glands, oral cavity, oropharynx, larynx, thyroid, facial and neck musculature and lymph nodes draining these areas.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Prior Head and Neck Radiation Therapy
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:For oncology, area of the body generally construed to comprise base of skull and facial bones, sinuses, orbits, salivary glands, oral cavity, oropharynx, larynx, thyroid, facial and neck musculature and lymph nodes draining these areas.:use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: For oncology, an area of the body generally construed to comprise the base of skull and facial bones, sinuses, orbits, salivary glands, oral cavity, oropharynx, larynx, thyroid, facial and neck musculature and lymph nodes draining these areas.

Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation or an event ended.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/23/17 jk transferred context, cap first letter in def, and added CSI, registration status per Round 5 finalization task.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Date prior RT to head and neck ended
